None.Name: Root
None.Description: Enable to become immobile and gain: Radial Thorns, Linked Fire

None.Name: Radial Thorns
None.Description: Every 10 seconds, unit fires thorns in all directions that deal 400 damage to enemies, up to 600 in total.

None.Name: Linked Fire
None.Description: Up to 5 entities connected to the root network support each other enabling more powerful attacks.

en.Description:
Lifepoints +60
Linked Fire: +1 Unit able to support the Network

Lifepoints +140
Linked Fire: +1 Unit able to support the Network

Lifepoints +150
Linked Fire: +1 Unit able to support the Network

Linked Fire: +1 Unit able to support the Network

Linked Fire: +1 Unit able to support the Network

ru.Description:
Lifepoints +60
Linked Fire: +1 Unit able to support the Network

Lifepoints +140
Linked Fire: +1 Unit able to support the Network

Lifepoints +150
Linked Fire: +1 Unit able to support the Network

Extra.en: Without a root network,  Thornbark attacks once every 10 seconds. With one unit (buildings do not count) in the root network,  this decreases by 4s,  down to 6s. With another unit added,  it decreases by 2s (half as much as previously),  to 4s. This goes on through 1s (3s),  0.5s (2.5s),  0.25s (2.25s),  and finally 0.125s for a maximum attack speed of 1 attack per 2.125 seconds approximately.
